name: More Demons
description: Adds additional demon difficulties above Extreme

show-list-position.name: Show List Position
show-list-position.description: Adds text that shows the position of the Demon on the list (Top 1-499).

show-extended-list-position.name: Show Extended List Position
show-extended-list-position.description: Adds text that shows the position of lower Demons on the list (Top 500-1149).

disable-bg.name: Disable BG Effects
disable-bg.description: Removes the background effects from Twisted+ Demon pages.
